website_summaries.verdict: The InFocus Kangaroo Mobile Desktop Pro is a small-form-factor PC that can turn any monitor, iPad, or iPhone into a Windows 10 device. But it's not worth the jump in price over the first Kangaroo Mobile Desktop.
cons: No internal upgrades from original Kangaroo Mobile Desktop, resulting in similar performance for a higher price

customer_reviews.title: Good if you know it's limits
customer_reviews.text: Works relatively well and the picture quality was very good. My only issue was that it overheated after playing videos for a few hours and started to lag heavily. For basic computing it's great but I wouldn't recommend it for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kangaroo needs some upgrades
customer_reviews.text: 2Gb of RAM is just not enough. Since Windows 10 doesn't allow for the use of ready boost on solid state devices, there is absolutely no way to upgrade the RAM. All in all, it can be used for email and some Facebook. For $169 I'm not sure what to expect, but an old laptop upgraded to 8Gb of RAM with the anniversary edition of Windows 10 does a lot more. I do however, look forward to seeing where Kangaroo goes in the future. I like the concept, but the reality of it just isn't there yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Heath

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but gets VERY HOT!
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a linux machine. Had no problems installing the latest Linux Mint 18 on it. It does however get hot when doing updates or other cpu intensive work. In fact it gets so hot even devices in the usb port get super hot (hot enough to burn). So put this somewhere animals or children aren't going to touch it.
customer_reviews.author: TechFiend

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little Mini PC
customer_reviews.text: Great little mini PC. I got a cheap version of windows 7 and upgraded to 10 before the deadline of free upgrades was up. This little thing works really nice. I love the fingerprint reader, its really easy to login to windows now. The dock is really cool. Has all the ports I need on it and with the battery its basically like a built in UPS!
customer_reviews.author: Zaphodjoe

customer_reviews.title: I've also installed Ubuntu on it and it's working pretty well. As for the hardware
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a secondary desktop for when I don't wanna power up my noisy primary desktop. I've also installed Ubuntu on it and it's working pretty well. As for the hardware, it's decent but the 2GB ram is a limitation. The 2.5" hard drive bay in the dock is only powered when you're plugged in, so you can't use it if you are on battery power. Also there is no support for Legacy OS installs so if you're playing around with Linux or ChromeOS, pick the UEFI version or you won't be able to boot up.
customer_reviews.author: Carl J

customer_reviews.title: A couple quirky things about windows 10 so you may need to do some research to fix known issues with that platform but the Kanga
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful little computer! I have been using this as my primary home computer and really enjoying it.. A couple quirky things about windows 10 so you may need to do some research to fix known issues with that platform but the Kangaroo mobile desktop is really a great find for anyone needing an inexpensive pc.
customer_reviews.author: Will White

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Love the expandable SD storage and also the option to add a SSD HD in the docking station. Cons: feel cheated not having the option to not purchase the docking station - they should at least include the small HDMI adapter/charging port for travel purposes. This thing can't run much concurrently at all... always have to close down web browser if I'm running something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.  Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the lovely bride a few weeks ago and it works well for her doing MS Office apps and general web surfing in her home office. Gotta make sure apps are custom installed on a separate HD as the drive that comes on it is small. The VGA port plug doesn't have screws and it comes out if bumped very hard so we try not to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Ebner

customer_reviews.title: awesome.
customer_reviews.text: its a bit slow but for my purpose it will do. I wish the larger one came with a windoas OS, i would have bought it. The windows OS when it finished registering only had one icon on the desktop, the trash can. No bloatware, awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Steve  Allman

customer_reviews.title: very cool!
customer_reviews.text: Surprising powerful mini computer with fingerprint security. This device was developed correctly. Enabling it's hot spot feature and using my iPhone to wifi connect to it with the Microsoft Remote Desktop Client App provided a viable computer setup. I can surf a Windows 10 operating system while physically in my pocket and while controlling it with my iPhone in my hands. Only real negative in my opinion is that to use the docking bay and a 500GB SATA SSD I installed, it needs to be plugged in to the AC power adapter. Other than that, very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy camper
customer_reviews.text: It's not a dependable product. Out of the month I've owned it I've used it three times. Bought a hard drive for it to expand the memory and it won't do what I need it to do. I don't have a lot of programs on only two and it only has 100 MB on main drive and programs aren't installed on it. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Scott D Moore

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I expected. I installed a WD 500GB hard drive,down loaded Steam and bingo I'm streaming games from my PC to the Kangaroo. I had one little issue with the display extending past the edges of the TV but a reduction in resolution fixed that . Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: nikky errickson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but it works. Very slow when using the ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap but it works. Very slow when using the Net. Locks up quite a bit shows using 70% power and memory just using FB.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: I really like the kangaroo PC
customer_reviews.text: I really like the kangaroo PC .I already own one I purchased the Pro because of the new dock it has a case to put a hard drive in it also has a VGA hook up plus HDMI hook up and now their is a audio jack so you can hook up speakers the kangaroo is loaded with Windows 10 fan less 2gigs of ram 32gigs of storage and is portable you can take and hook up to most any monitor or screen very easy to set up and use I would recommend this PC to any one
customer_reviews.author: R Heller

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, but fingerprint reader doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: It works great, quality is great, speed is good...only reason I am only giving 3 stars is because fingerprint reader quit working within 2 weeks of buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Monique S.

customer_reviews.title: Battery is a great addition. The system runs to hot to function ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery is a great addition. The system runs to hot to function at its highest capacity. Seems to be a design issue. Adding a manual heat-sync and fan, would love to be reimbursed by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: fort what i needed them for they work very well
customer_reviews.author: Richard Noble

customer_reviews.title: A solid computer for my TV. Can't really game ...
customer_reviews.text: A solid computer for my TV. Can't really game on it, but you can stream with ease and do all web based activities.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: I've had it for a day and the power plug ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a day and the power plug fell out once so far (with no assistance from gravity). The power connection into the docking station is very insecure.
customer_reviews.author: William Haddad

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: This is one awesome product. Easy to set up and to use. I did add a second solid state hard drive to increase the amount of storage and to add optional programs. It comes with Windows 10 x64. The dock has plenty of room to add via USB port various other components i.e.cd player, keyboard and mouse, Bluetooth speakers, headphone plug, Vega port, HDMI port , Ethernet port or wireless connection, . For such a small device, I'm surprised it has so much power. I love new things and this is a lot of fun. All you need is a monitor, wireless keyboard/mouse or touch keyboard, and speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but the tech isn't there yet
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but the tech isn't there yet, overheated very quickly and had difficulty connecting to the wi-fi, but would buy if it was more well developed
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: This device is a Kangaroo Mobile Desktop (which discontinued for no reason)+ Dock, and with much worse performance. The biggest problem is overheating, one Skype conference call can bring it down to their knees. CPU core temp goes up to 82-85 Celcius, and as a result, CPU clock lowered down to 240Mhz (yes, you read it right, 240Mhz). Everything slow down to a crawl, your audio, video, .. The old version (without dock) is not perfect, but still up to the task. This one is NO NO NO.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen Phong

customer_reviews.title: small box big performance
customer_reviews.text: this little computer is awesome how can so much come in such a small package do not hesitate this computer is the real deal
customer_reviews.author: R 1 Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mom and loved it so much, I'm going to get another one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The unit tends to run very hot! It's also seems to need to be restarted every few days!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Smith

customer_reviews.title: I really like this unit
customer_reviews.text: I really like this unit. I've done a review on it on my youtube channel, AICproductions. Small and powerful enough for a home theater PC.
customer_reviews.author: AICvideo

customer_reviews.title: Best mini pc for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this mini pc is all the ports. Love the flexibility of having a pc for my tv. One other thing no doggles of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Can't stream netflix...
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth the money. I bought this for one reason, streaming media like Netflix, Amazon Prime Video and HBO Go, and it's incapable of doing this. Video is choppy and the unit overheats. It's also slow just to load websites. I bought this to replace a 5 year old Acer Revo (which cost roughly the same back then) and it doesn't seem to be any faster. I am extremely disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Celaya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i gave this as a christmas present for my hubby and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: dyan jay martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little computer I use it to remote stream video from my home movie server
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kangaroo
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product very portable I would recommend it for anyone to buy it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: KMD Pro 1.44GHz.
customer_reviews.text: Considering buying after watching reviews, seems nice and is compact for all around use. Now just lower the price about $35.00 and you'll probably see alot more customers buying this unit.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

product_meta.title: Kangaroo Mobile Desktop Pro (1.44 GHz Intel Atom x5-Z8500,2GB LPDDR3 RAM,32GB eMMC Hard Drive, Windows 10 64-bitHome edition), Black

Windows Hello Integration w/ Fingerprint Reader for security and personalization
OSLinx app for iPad allows full access / interaction with Kangaroo Windows Desktop
Modular design architecture and integrated battery allows for hotplugability between multiple dock locations
Premium quality aluminum case and handheld sized device for portability and convenience
